attributes.action: Allow ukrainian refugees into the uk without a visa fora minimum of 3 years.
attributes.additional_details: The current war situation in Ukraine is one that is happening through no fault of the Ukrainian people. We are limited as a nation in ways we can help. However I know one way thousands of us can help and want to help us by offering our spare rooms, houses etc to families, women and children fleeing their home country a safe place to stay and live for as long as needed. This is something we must be aloud to do as a way of standing by our friends Ukraine.
attributes.background: Debate allowing Ukrainians refugees into the uk without a visa for a minimum of 3 years. Thousands of us can help and want to help us by offering our spare rooms, houses etc to families, women and children fleeing their home country a safe place to stay and live for as long as needed.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open on this topic which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
